items.sentence: I suspect Tom and Mary were there by themselves.
I suspect Tom and Mary are skeptical about that.
I suspect Tom and Mary are scared of each other.
For starters, I want to eat a little bit of pie.
Tom said that he was in no hurry to get married.
I never thought that Tom would take it this far.
What's wrong with the way Tom and I are dressed?
If you do that, don't blame me for what happens.
Tom blamed his parents for not raising him well.
Dressed in ceremonial garb, he began the ritual.
I'm afraid that I can't afford to buy a new car.
Tom thought maybe Mary and John were gunrunners.
Tom didn't know where Mary had put his suitcase.
That's not the kind of that thing we like to do.
Tom started crying as soon as he saw his mother.
Children will often cry when they're frightened.
Everything that Tom told me about Mary was true.
How did you get into my apartment without a key?
I think your talents could be put to better use.
Tom was raised in Australia by a Canadian woman.
